beReported.cn: 您的游戏账号被举报了，请至 {website}/player/{originUserId} 查看详情
beReported.en: You were reported by someone, see {website}/player/{originUserId} for detail

beJudged.cn: 您的案件被裁决为 {status} ，请至 {website}/player/{originUserId} 查看详情
beJudged.en: Your case was judged as {status}, see {website}/player/{originUserId} for detail

beReplied.cn: 您在 {playername} 的案件有新回复，请至 {website}/player/{originUserId} 查看详情
beReplied.en: You have an reply under {playername}'s thread, see {website}/player/{originUserId}

newBanAppeal.cn: {playername} 的案件提交了申诉，请至 {website}/player/{originUserId} 查看详情
newBanAppeal.en: {playername} has a new ban appeal, see {website}/player/{originUserId}
